successes.title: Slim - The Thinnest Wallet Ever.
successes.description: The Slim Wallet is a super-thin, card-carrying over-achiever. Designed for minimalists.

Pledges.description: EARLY BIRD: $20 gets you one Slim of your color choice. Shipping included within the USA (please add $5 for international shipping).
MINIMALIST: $25 gets you one Slim of your color choice. Shipping included within the USA (please add $5 for international shipping).

DOUBLE DOWN: $50 gets you two Slims of your color choice - any color combination.
Shipping included within the USA (please add $5 for international shipping).
SIX PACK: $100 gets you six Slims of your color choice - any color combination. Shipping included within the USA (please add $5 for international shipping).
